name: All that glitters is not gold
name_original: All that glitters is not gold
description:
Game submitted to GameDev.tv Game Jam 2021

In this infinite runner you need to take as much gold as possible. The problem is that all that glitter is not gold!

Based on the difficult level you choose gold will be gold and coins will be coins, or the things that glitter will be gold, or the things that not glitter will be gold, or it will change when the Prince of Morocco says his famous sentence

But it is not the only character created by Shakespeare that will show in this game, they will be 2 more ones, that will cause some different kind of havoc in the scenario
